body:
The kube-build container starts a rsync daemon which accepts connections from the same [docker bridge](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/build/build-image/rsyncd.sh#L36), however, normally, pods do not use the same docker bridge(depends on the setup though). We should pass the pod ip into `host allow` list along with the docker bridge subnet, see the error message below:

```console
+++ [0821 02:52:26] Syncing sources to container
/home/jenkins/workspace/tess-build-dev/kubernetes
172.17.0.3:8730
@ERROR: access denied to k8s from UNDETERMINED (10.147.169.24)
rsync error: error starting client-server protocol (code 5) at main.c(1653) [sender=3.1.0]
!!! [0821 02:52:34] Call tree:
!!! [0821 02:52:34]  1: build/../build/common.sh:676 kube::build::rsync(...)
!!! [0821 02:52:34]  2: build/../build/common.sh:431 kube::build::sync_to_container(...)
!!! [0821 02:52:34]  3: build/release.sh:35 kube::build::build_image(...)
!!! Error in build/../build/common.sh:656
  Error in build/../build/common.sh:656. '((i<5-1))' exited with status 5
Call stack:
  1: build/../build/common.sh:656 kube::build::rsync(...)
  2: build/../build/common.sh:676 kube::build::sync_to_container(...)
  3: build/../build/common.sh:431 kube::build::build_image(...)
  4: build/release.sh:35 main(...)
```

In my case, `10.147.169.24` is the pod ip address, while in kube-build container:

```console
# cat rsyncd.conf                                                                                                                                                                                           
pid file = /tmp/rsync.k8s/rsyncd.pid                                                                                                                                                                        
use chroot = no                                                                                                                                                                                             
log file = /dev/stdout                                                                                                                                                                                      
reverse lookup = no                                                                                                                                                                                         
munge symlinks = no                                                                                                                                                                                         
port = 8730                                                                                                                                                                                                 
[k8s]                                                                                                                                                                                                       
  numeric ids = true                                                                                                                                                                                        
    uid = 0                                                                                                                                                                                                 
  gid = 0                                                                                                                                                                                                   
  hosts deny = *                                                                                                                                                                                            
  hosts allow = 172.17.0.0/16                                                                                                                                                                               
  auth users = k8s                                                                                                                                                                                          
  secrets file = /tmp/rsync.k8s/rsyncd.secrets                                                                                                                                                              
  read only = false                                                                                                                                                                                         
  path = /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes                                                                                                                                                                          
  filter = - /.make/ - /.git/ - /_tmp/ 
```

As shown above, `172.17.0.0/16` is the subnet configured on docker0 bridge.
